Event.name: Heralding
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Communicator</fen> announces (linguistically or non-linguistically) the imminent arrival of an <fen>Individual</fen> or the occurrence of an <fen>Event</fen>. Generally, the <fen>Communicator</fen> is attempting to inform the public.
<ex><fex name="evt">The unveiling of Alinghi's keel</fex> was <t>heralded</t> <fex name="com">by alp horns</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="com">A brass band</fex> <t>heralded</t> <fex name="evt">his arrival</fex> and he was flanked by secret service agents</ex>
<ex><fex name="med">The telegram</fex> <t>heralded</t> <fex name="Ind">him</fex>, but with boundless miles for hiding he had stolen in under the cover of night</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Communicator
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Communicator</fen> greets the arrival of an <fen>Individual</fen> or occurrence of an <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the Communicator heralds.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which a <fen>Communicator</fen> heralds. </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the time when the <fen>Communicator</fen> heralds.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which a <fen>Communicator</fen> heralds.
<ex>The town <t>heralded</t> his arrival <fex name="mns">with a peal of church bells</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Communicator</fen> that also affect the heralding (<ment> eagerly, carefully</ment>).
</def-root>

Arg.name: Individual
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who is greeted at their arrival by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The occurrence which is greeted by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
<ex>Sheep scattered from the road as trumpets <t>heralded</t> <fex name="evt">his arrival at the castle gates</fex></ex></def-root>
